## Inserting code 

```{r}
#| echo: true 

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Theoph, aes(Time, conc)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 13)
```


---

## Highlighting code 

```{r}
#| echo: true 
#| code-line-numbers: "1-2|3,4"
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Theoph, aes(Time, conc)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 13)
```
